Docs.summary: The namespace contains classes that support interaction with relational databases in LINQ to SQL applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] is a technology that provides a run-time infrastructure for managing relational data as objects. For more information, see [LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
